name: Band Ade
description:
Created for the Game Off 2022.

Adam, Ariana, Cole, and River, members of the memorable band, The Elementals, found out the coffee house where they had their first gig is getting shut down by the bank. They're getting the band back together for one last show to save the underdog coffee house from the heartless capitalists.

Use their power of Earth, Air, Fire, and Water to make their way to the coffee house.

github repository: github.com/psynut/BandAde
